channel.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team!Srry for double post. I added more pictures
channel.description:
Hello guys, i have edited Hybrid pvp source and client v3 to my own server Lithuania Pk. It have a lot of bosses, minigames and more!!! So, here we are. The minigames: -Barrow minigame! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=KopijaiBarrowminigame.jpg -Pest control! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ19QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dpestcontrol.jpg -Gzhaar cave! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ28QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DJad.jpg -Duel arena! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ34QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DDuelarena.jpg A lot of bosses: -Godwars! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ31QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dgodwars.jpg -King black dragon! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ27QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DkBD.jpg -Dagannoth kings! Haven’t got picture  -Tormented demons! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ7QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTormenteddemons.jpg -Corporal beast! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ37QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dcorporalbeast.jpg Newest Pk armor! -Vesta! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=Vesta.jpg -Zuriel! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ47QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DZuriel.jpg -Morigan! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ21QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DMorigan.jpg -Statius! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ11QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DStatius.jpg -Primal! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ16QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DPrimal.jpg -Torva! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ6QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTorva.jpg -Elite black! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ33QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DEliteblack.jpg Full working ags spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ26QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DKopijaiagsspec.jpg Zgs spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg Bgs spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ42QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dbgsspec.jpg Sgs spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ13QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DSgsspec.jpg Dragon claws spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ36QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DDragonclawsspec.jpg Statius hammer spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ10QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DStatiusHammerspec.jpg Vls spec! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ2QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DVlsspec.jpg And more like chaotic! Chaotic rapier! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ39QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticrapier.jpg Chaotic maul! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ40QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticmaul.jpg Chaotic longsword! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ41QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dchaoticlongsword.jpg Working turmoil! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ5QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dturmoil.jpg Working taste vengeance! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ8QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DTaste.jpg Working soul split too! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ12QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3DSoulsplit.jpg Easy training at rock crabs! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ14QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Drockcrabs.jpg Added new shop! http://s1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa431/rokas2/?action=view&current=zgsspec.jpg#!oZZ17QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1197.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Faa431%2Frokas2%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dpkstore-1.jpg
So this is my server, little changed from hybrid scape v3 but I have added a few new commands for better game . I think you liked it, if oyu want to join my development team fill in information in here: [center][center]Server Sided Coders Code: [Select] Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: How well can you code java: MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):
Client Sided Coders Code: [Select] Client Coder Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be Working: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: Can you add Custom Buttons: Are you good with Interfaces? MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):
Hoster Code: [Select] Name: Age: How Many hours can you Host: Have you hosted a server before:
GFX Artist Code: [Select] Name: Age: Experience: Programs you use: Show some work:[/center][/center] Thank you for your time. :)

item.title: Lithuania Pk! Need development team!Srry for double post. I added more pictures
item.dc:creator: @L0n3x L0n3x
item.description:
@L0n3x wrote:

Hello guys, i have edited Hybrid pvp source and client v3 to my own server Lithuania Pk.
It have a lot of bosses, minigames and more!!!
So, here we are. The minigames:
-Barrow minigame!

-Pest control!

-Gzhaar cave!

-Duel arena!

A lot of bosses:
-Godwars!

-King black dragon!

-Dagannoth kings!
Haven’t got picture 
-Tormented demons!

-Corporal beast!

Newest Pk armor!
-Vesta!

-Zuriel!

-Morigan!

-Statius!

-Primal!

-Torva!

-Elite black!

Full working ags spec!

Zgs spec!

Bgs spec!

Sgs spec!

Dragon claws spec!

Statius hammer spec!

Vls spec!

And more like chaotic!
Chaotic rapier!

Chaotic maul!

Chaotic longsword!

Working turmoil!

Working taste vengeance!

Working soul split too!

Easy training at rock crabs!

Added new shop!

So this is my server, little changed from hybrid scape v3 but I have added a few new commands for better game . I think you liked it, if oyu want to join my development team fill in information in here:
[center][center]Server Sided Coders
Code: [Select]
Name:
Age:
Why do you want this job:
How much time will you be working:
Will you follow the rules:
Any Experience:
How well can you code java:
MSN (Optional):
Skype (Optional):

Client Sided Coders
Code: [Select]

Name:
Age:

Are you good with Interfaces?
MSN (Optional):

Code: [Select]
Name:
Age:
How Many hours can you Host:
Have you hosted a server before:

Code: [Select]

Age:

Programs you use:
Show some work:[/center][/center]
Thank you for your time.
